description:
Have you ever wanted to build a professional looking website, but didn't know where to start? Now you can with Wordpress.

This course is a complete course for anyone, no matter what your technical ability. This course assumes no prior knowledge!

We'll start at the beginning, by choosing a domain name and setting it up to work with a web host.

Once Wordpress is installed, we'll login and have a look around to familiarize ourselves with the main areas of the Dashboard.

If you have some valuable content which you want to sell on your own custom branded website and earn money then this course is for you.

Everything used in the course is free apart from Domain and Hosting which is anyways required for any website.

I have designed this course in a simple step-by-step but to the point fashion so anyone will be able to build their own website with no previous experience in shortest time.
title: Learn to Build a Membership Website using WordPress
